meta.article_title: April 30, 2012 - Chalk Up Wins with Chop Blocks

debutant: To do a chop block, simply chop down lightly as you block the incoming topspin (usually against a loop), holding the racket loosely.

exercices_complementaires.description: Place the ball to the corners to force the opponent to use his weaker (or more awkward against a soft ball) stroke, or to the middle to cut off angles.

erreurs_a_eviter: Rarely chop block twice in a row.
